content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have access to your personal schedule or memories, so I don't know about your regular coffee break with Sarah.

But I can suggest a few options to help you remember:

1. Check your calendar: Look at your digital or physical calendar to see if you've scheduled a recurring coffee break with Sarah.
2. Ask Sarah: Reach out to Sarah directly and ask her when your next coffee break is scheduled.
3. Check your reminders: If you've set a reminder on your phone or computer, check to see if it's listed.
4. Create a routine: Consider setting a regular schedule for your coffee breaks with Sarah, so you can both plan ahead and make it a habit.

I hope this helps!
